Description: You stab a creature with an appendage steeped in poison. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is poisoned.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
